title: Background definition
description: The attributes used for exporting a background using tools/tools sprite-export

$schema.description: The schema to validate this json for

is8bpp.description: Whether to export this sprite as 8bpp characters

group-width.description: The width of the 'block' in which to regroup this image in tiles

group-height.description: The height of the 'block' in which to regroup this image in tiles

preserve-order.description: If true, the colors will not be rearranged and the palettes must form groups of 16.

export-palettes.description: If false, the palettes will be supressed from the final exported file. Default is true.

remap-palettes.description: An array describing the remapping of the palettes present

items.description: This ID will be the new ID associated with the current palette.
